model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Neighbors A: I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Neighbors A is a person who loves spending time with God every day, starting with prayer and reading passages from the Bible. They listen to worship music and have a routine that has brought positive changes to their life, helping them stay focused and calm throughout the day. Neighbors A is thankful for all the blessings in life and has made good friends in the neighborhood. Their home is a place where they feel comfortable and safe.

Relationship Description:
Neighbors A and Neighbors B share a friendly and warm relationship, with Neighbors A appreciating Neighbors B as a neighbor. They have organized a block party together in the past and enjoy spending time together, reminiscing about past events and planning for future gatherings.

Event Description:
Neighbors A recently moved to a new neighborhood and met some kids who showed them around. They are starting to feel more at home and have found a park nearby and a cute coffee shop to explore. Neighbors A wants to make new friends and appreciates having Neighbors B as a supportive neighbor. Neighbors B has been happy to have Neighbors A as a neighbor and is excited to see where their new journey takes them.
current_dialogue: Neighbors A: I just visited this amazing new city. The architecture was stunning, the streets were so clean, and the people were very friendly.
